N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 520.4 - Defenses

State Regulations

The following defenses may be raised against the proposed
referral for offset of tax overpayments, in whole or in part: (a) the person who received the notice of the
tax overpayments offset is not the person identified as owing the medical
assistance overpayments; (b) the
overpayments have been paid in full; (c) the overpayments have been partially paid
and the amount due is less than the amount set forth in the notice; or
(d) the person is making current
payments to repay the overpayments in accordance with an agreement with the
department (or a social services district). Notes
